sub_title: LAYERS OF REALITY - BROADVIEW | changing perspectives - FABRICAT | modest design
summary:
“If you look closely at a frog's tail, you will see that it has none”. 
Lao Tse

It is this 2600-year-old text by the Chinese philosopher and founder of Taoism Lao Tse, which inspires me to look further, deeper and from a new perspective at everyday things. 

This way of looking opens the way for me to play endlessly with meanings, assumptions and convictions, with shapes, colors and rhythms, structures, with small and large truths.

Over the past decades, my working life has split into two areas that functioned well side by side: unraveling complex issues within a wide range of national and international organizations from a systems perspective, and my practical work as a designer, painter and photographer.

The nice thing is that these areas of work have come closer and closer together in recent years, not least because I can draw from the same creative source for both areas. 
And also because within FABRICAT we are guided by the overwhelming beauty of nature and at the same time I am always looking for the natural dynamics of a system when analyzing systemically. 

Universal beauty in connection!

profile_positions.description:
When I look back at my work practice of the past 30 years in the field of systems thinking, system dynamics & divergent thinking, there are a number of themes that played a role in almost all cases. Sometimes a supporting role, but often a role of decisive significance. These are the key issues that, in an often complex composition, can set things in motion, but can also lead to a standstill and failure. 

Gaining a better understanding of and grip on the dynamics of these key issues means being able to make the difference between repeated failure and sustainable success. 

For that reason, the LAYERS OF REALITY project, exposing layers in reality, was developed: a special combination of systems thinking and insights into the physical functioning of our brain.

All info on www.layersofreality.nl
profile_positions.title: sr consultant systems thinking, systemdynamics & divergent thinking

profile_positions.description:
“It's all about nature” is the guiding principle of FABRICAT modest design, the design studio of Madieke Fleuren and Jos Metselaar.

In our designs of exclusive full-hand-made objects, our starting point is the special and unexpected shapes, colours, textures, patterns and rhythms that nature offers us. We place the visible, obvious, in a new perspective, creating unexpected representations and new meanings.

For example, we stop time in our ShadowBoxes: we dry natural material and then we bring it back to life with specifically developed macro photography. 
To really bring natural beauty to life, we use one of our most basic sources: light. 
In this way the light changes the perspective and brings life back in the ever-changing light conditions of a window frame.

Our objects can be seen in our studio in Nijmegen and at several prominent locations in the country, including museum Kranenburgh in Bergen (NH) and of course on www.fabricat.nl. 

We also work on commission in exclusive design projects and to strengthen the identity, atmosphere and character of public spaces. 

For private customers it is possible to elaborate specific wishes in an exclusive object.
profile_positions.title: visual artist & designer

profile_positions.description:
Grip krijgen op een complex vraagstuk vraagt in de regel flinke inspanningen in analyse en langdurend onderzoek. Soms zijn deze inspanningen nog ingewikkelder dan het vraagstuk zelf of verlies je een al snel het gevoel van eigendom over de kwestie. 

Vanuit de stellige overtuiging dat dit ook heel anders kan, ontwikkelde wij BROADVIEW | explore! Een web-based applicatie die het mogelijk maakt om in slechts enkele dialoogsessies live of remote de werking van het meest complexe systeem, dat onder een vraagstuk ligt, met elkaar glashelder te krijgen. 

Verdieping en verbreding in systems thinking, system dynamics, divergent denken en breinleren is te vinden in de BROADVIEW| academy waarin de meerdaagse leergang Adaptive Systems en een scala aan toegepaste trainingsonderwerpen is ondergebracht.

profile_positions.description:
Binnen deze onderneming was ik verantwoordelijk voor organisatieadvisering en organisatieontwikkeling ten behoeve van een breed scala ondernemingen en instellingen. Diverse landelijke adviestrajecten vanuit Syntens, landelijk innovatienetwerk voor MKB-ondernemers, diverse adviestrajecten vanuit de door het ministerie van Economische Zaken geïnitieerde trajecten “ Van Pionier naar Manager” en “Ontwikkeling Kennismanagement binnen ondernemingen”. 
Door ministerie van EZ en TNO gecertificeerd als MKB-TNO adviseur: gesubsidieerde ondersteuning voor innovatieve MKB-ondernemingen.
	
Begin jaren ’90 eerste contacten in de wereld van System Dynamics.

Vanuit de toepassing van System Dynamics en het systeemdenken een breed scala aan interventies binnen organisaties geleid en begeleid, waaronder management development ten behoeve van de directies van de Nederlandse Belastingdienst vanuit het landelijk centrum Kennis & Communicatie, advisering ten behoeve van Shell, KPN en diverse gemeentelijke organisaties, de opzet en ontwikkeling van landelijk arbeidsmarktonderzoek in de zorgsector, de ontwikkeling van Regionale Indicatieorganen in de zorgsector, diverse conflictinterventies en trajecten crisismanagement en ontwikkeling en uitvoering van trajecten Real Time Strategic Change.
